title._content: [Portrait of Leonard Bernstein, Carnegie Hall, New York, N.Y., between 1946 and 1948] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Leonard Bernstein, Carnegie Hall, New York, N.Y., between 1946 and 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 029 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Bernstein, Leonard, 1918- Conductors (Music)--1940-1950. Composers--1940-1950. Carnegie Hall Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
